cgcloud__Batch_Process_Configuration__c.name: cgcloud__Batch_Process_Configuration__c
cgcloud__Batch_Process_Configuration__c.description: Custom setting that captures the configuration of the batch process.

cgcloud__Apex_Class__c.description: Batch process class that's to be executed.

cgcloud__Execute_Nightly_Calculation__c.description: Configuration indicating that the TPM Calculation Chain should be initiated once per night.

cgcloud__Friday__c.description: Configuration flag, indicating that the Batch Process in context should run on Fridays.

cgcloud__Job_Name__c.description: Name of the Batch Job to be executed.

cgcloud__Last_Run__c.description: Time at which the server for this sales org was last started.

cgcloud__Monday__c.description: Configuration flag, indicating that the Batch Process in context should run on Mondays.

cgcloud__Promotion_Template__c.description: Promotion Template filter, in case of promotion calculations only promotions of this type are calculated.

cgcloud__Refresh_Account_Product_List__c.description: Indicates the mode of Account Product List.

cgcloud__Run_Mode__c.description: Determines whether the complex pricing processes run in Delta or Full mode.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales Org for which this setting is defined.

cgcloud__Saturday__c.description: Configuration flag, indicating that the Batch Process in context should run on Saturdays.

cgcloud__Start_Time__c.description: Time at which the server is to be started. Restricted to full hours. It's stored in GMT+0 (UTC) in a 24-hour format.

cgcloud__Sunday__c.description: Configuration flag, indicating that the Batch Process in context should run on Sundays.

cgcloud__Thursday__c.description: Configuration flag, indicating that the Batch Process in context should run on Thursdays.

cgcloud__Tuesday__c.description: Configuration flag, indicating that the Batch Process in context should run on Tuesdays.

cgcloud__Wednesday__c.description: Configuration flag, indicating that the Batch Process in context should run on Wednesdays.
